attributes.action: SACK PRITI PATEL FOR NOT STOPPING  MIGRANT CROSSINGS DESPITE ALL HER PROMISES.
attributes.additional_details: I want her sacked for incompetence regarding her complete and utter failings with regard to stopping migrant crossings.This was the will of the electorate and she has repeatedly spoken tough on the issue,but done nothing in over 2years. Its getting worse not better.STOP IT NOW.
attributes.background: I demand the immediate sacking of Priti Patel

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
